title: TF: Wear Light
summary: A fast and handy light source for Android Wear
description: Wear Light is a plugin for Tiny Flashlight and depends on it.Wear Light enables the full display brightness of your Android Wear smart watch. A fast and handy light source. Very convenient when you need to hit the lock in the dark.Features:=========* Turn on the light by saying "Open Light"* Full screen brightness* Automatically installed on you Android Wear smart watch
descriptionHTML:
Wear Light is a plugin for Tiny Flashlight and depends on it.

Wear Light enables the full display brightness of your Android Wear smart watch. A fast and handy light source. Very convenient when you need to hit the lock in the dark.

Features:
=========
* Turn on the light by saying "Open Light"
* Full screen brightness
* Automatically installed on you Android Wear smart watch
comments: Yup... makes a white screen on the Gear Live.  It's the best available for that.  Doesn't increase brightness, though, nor have any settings or other features. In the immortal words of Anna Russell, "Remember the [G1]"?
Handy app Works on my Moto 360. Was skeptical at first because of the 3 sub par 3 star review, but works quite well. Don't let the negative reviews shy you away from trying this app out.
